original_text: They went into the house as if they wanted to get some wheat. But they pushed knives into Ish-Bosheth's stomach. Then Recab and his brother Baanah escaped.
korean_text: 레갑과 그의 형제 바아나가 밀을 가지러 온 체하고 집 가운데로 들어가서 그의 배를 찌르고 도망하였더라

sentences.original_text: as if they wanted to get some wheat
Then Recab and his brother Baanah escaped
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 레갑과 그의 형제 바아나가 도망쳤습니다
